analysis.description:
CryptoColors (/unique_chucks/35/0xc70afb5612b16d36d2204052f81932064fd084c5.sol#98-614) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/35/0xc70afb5612b16d36d2204052f81932064fd084c5.sol#396-402)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/35/0xc70afb5612b16d36d2204052f81932064fd084c5.sol#421-427)

Reentrancy in CryptoColors.buy (/unique_chucks/35/0xc70afb5612b16d36d2204052f81932064fd084c5.sol#318-344):
	External calls:
	- (_nbColors,value) = buyColors(msg.sender,value) (/unique_chucks/35/0xc70afb5612b16d36d2204052f81932064fd084c5.sol#326-327)
	- mintPin(msg.sender,_nbColors) (/unique_chucks/35/0xc70afb5612b16d36d2204052f81932064fd084c5.sol#338)
	State variables written after the call(s):
